title: Density Estimation Using Kernel Density
description: In this lab, we will explore density estimation, which is a technique used to estimate the probability density function of a random variable. Specifically, we will focus on kernel density estimation, which is a non-parametric method for estimating the density.

meta.title: Density Estimation | Kernel Density Estimation | Python Tutorial
meta.description: Explore density estimation techniques using Python, focusing on kernel density estimation for estimating the probability density function of a random variable.
meta.keywords: density estimation, kernel density estimation, Python, data analysis, machine learning
